view.academicStaffUI
Class ViewPublicationAsStaff

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      view.academicStaffUI.ViewPublicationAsStaff
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class ViewPublicationAsStaff
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

ViewPublicationAsStaff class is the GUI for academic staff to view the details of the publication they choose from the LoginAsStaff.

Users can view specific Publication which can be book, JournalPaper and ConferencePaper. Users can request copy of publication they view. This class also provide the entry for general users to return back to the LoginAsStaff.

Version:
Author:
See Also:
Publication, JournalPaper, ConferencePaper, Publication, LoginAsStaff, Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

ViewPublicationAsStaff

public ViewPublicationAsStaff(AcademicStaffController controller)
Creates a ViewPublicationAsStaff instance with the specified AcademicStaffController. It will display the frame of ViewPublicationAsStaff.

Parameters:
controller - The controller which has the authority to control this class
See Also:
AcademicStaffController
Method Detail

actionPerformed

public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent arg0)
This method to implement the Action Listener of different components.

For addNewPublicationButton Listener When user press addNewPublicationButton, the Frame will switch to AddPublication GUI

For editMyPublicationButton Listener When user press editMyPublicationButton, the Frame will switch to EditPublication GUI

For requestButton Listener When user press requestButton, a request copy email will send to the author

For returnButton Listener When user press returnButton, the current frame will switch to HomePage GUI

Specified by:
actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener

formalizeAuthor

public java.lang.String formalizeAuthor(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> authorSet)
The method is used to formalize the Authors format.

Parameters:
authorSet - The String Set of author which need to be formalized
Returns:
Return a String which is formalized
